lead_paragraph: Minutes after collecting 53 points, 17 assists and 16 rebounds in his second straight triple-double, Houston's James Harden was asked what it has been like to play in new coach Mike D'Antoni's system.
snippet: Minutes after collecting 53 points, 17 assists and 16 rebounds in his second straight triple-double, Houston's James Harden was asked what it has been like to play in new coach Mike D'Antoni's system....

headline.main: Harden Scores 53 in Triple-Double, Rockets Beat Knicks
headline.print_headline: Harden Scores 53 in Triple-Double, Rockets Beat Knicks
